meanings.sent1: I become happy when I see my friends.
meanings.sent2: She will become a doctor when she grows up.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar will become a beautiful butterfly one day.
meanings.sent4: With hard work, he will become a successful businessman.
meanings.sent5: The seeds will become flowers in the spring.

meanings.sent1: The new dress looks become on you.
meanings.sent2: The cozy cabin by the lake is become for a weekend getaway.
meanings.sent3: The colorful decorations are become for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her elegant outfit is become for the special occasion.
meanings.sent5: The fresh paint color is become for the living room walls.

meanings.sent1: The water will become ice when it freezes.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar becomes a chrysalis before turning into a butterfly.
meanings.sent3: The pumpkin becomes a carriage in the fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: The shy student becomes confident after joining the drama club.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds become darker before the rain starts.
